name: @com.kautiainen.antti/jsontools
description: JSON stringifying and parsing tool allowing defining context sensitive reviver and replacer functions and chaining converters

scripts.publish: npm run test && npm publish --access public
scripts.test:package:win32: SET NODE_ENV=test && cd package-test && npm run test
scripts.test:package:nix: export SET NODE_ENV=test && cd package-test && npm run test

author: Antti Kautiainenn <antti@kautiainen.com>
